en.title: Upload application form
en.youNeed: Please upload the application form that you have already completed.
en.youNeed2: If you are not the person name on the application, you must need to complete an additional form to ask for permission to apply on behalf of someone else.
en.youNeed3: You may also need to upload a confidentiality form if you need the details of the person named on the application to be kept confidential.
en.uploadDescription: Please upload all required forms below.
en.uploadRequirement:
• File formats: MS Word, MS Excel, PDF, JPG, GIF, PNG, TXT, RTF
  • File size per document: up to 20 megabytes (MB)
  • Files cannot be password protected

You can’t upload executable(.exe) .zip or other archive files due to virus risks.

cy.title: Upload application form - (Whelsh)
cy.youNeed: Please upload the application form that you have already completed. - (Whelsh)
cy.youNeed2: If you are not the person name on the application, you must need to complete an additional form to ask for permission to apply on behalf of someone else. - (Whelsh)
cy.youNeed3: You may also need to upload a confidentiality form if you need the details of the person named on the application to be kept confidential. - (Whelsh)
cy.uploadDescription: Please upload all required forms below. - (Whelsh)
cy.uploadRequirement:
• File formats: MS Word, MS Excel, PDF, JPG, GIF, PNG, TXT, RTF
  • File size per document: up to 20 megabytes (MB)
  • Files cannot be password protected

You can’t upload executable(.exe) .zip or other archive files due to virus risks.

(Whelsh)

en.SIZE_ERROR: File size exceeds 20Mb. Please upload a file that is less than 20Mb
en.FORMAT_ERROR: This service only accepts files in the formats - Ms Word, Ms Excel, PDF, JPG, GIF, PNG, TXT, RTF
en.TOTAL_FILES_EXCEED_ERROR: You can upload 5 files only. Please delete one of the uploaded files and retry
